sentences.en: ...a Nordic saga of giants.
sentences.cn: …一部关于巨人的北欧传奇。

sentences.en: a giant electronics company
sentences.cn: 一家电子产品巨头

sentences.en: a giant tortoise
sentences.cn: 巨龟

sentences.en: A giant wildcat is being hunted after 58 lambs were butchered.
sentences.cn: 一只大野猫在捕杀了58只羊羔后遭到猎捕。

sentences.en: a huge balloon shaped like a giant cow
sentences.cn: 形似一头巨牛的大气球

sentences.en: a Nordic saga of giants
sentences.cn: 一部关于巨人的北欧传奇

sentences.en: A whole valley of boulders tossed higgledy-piggledy as though by some giant.
sentences.cn: 整个山谷里巨石翻滚，就像有巨人在狂扔乱掷。

sentences.en: Fewer than a thousand giant pandas still live in the wild.
sentences.cn: 只有不到1,000只大熊猫仍然在野外生活。

sentences.en: He's a giant of a man.
sentences.cn: 他是个巨人。

sentences.en: Laborers were trained to handle 50 - ton compactors and giant cranes.
sentences.cn: 工人们接受操作五十吨压土机和巨型起重机的训练.

sentences.en: Once upon a time there was a giant with two heads.
sentences.cn: 从前有个两头巨人.

sentences.en: Overhead cranes were lifting giant sheets of steel.
sentences.cn: 高架起重机正吊起一块块巨大的钢板。

sentences.en: Shakespeare is a giant among writers.
sentences.cn: 莎士比亚是作家中的巨擘.

sentences.en: the German chemicals giant, BASF
sentences.cn: 德国化工巨头巴斯夫公司

sentences.en: The giant cactus is the vegetable skycraper.
sentences.cn: 高大的仙人掌是植物界巨人.

sentences.en: The giant jets that increasingly dominate the world's airways.
sentences.cn: 越来越称雄于世界航线的巨型喷气机.

sentences.en: The giant packet gives you more for less money!
sentences.cn: 特大的包装使你用便宜的价钱买到超值的分量!

sentences.en: The new finds have deepened our knowledge of giant ape.
sentences.cn: 新的发现物加深了我们对巨猿的认识.

sentences.en: The result has been a giant leap in productivity.
sentences.cn: 其结果是生产力的大幅提高。

sentences.en: The team's mascot is a giant swan.
sentences.cn: 这个队的吉祥物是只大天鹅。

words.tran_cn: 巨人；伟人；[植][动]巨大的动物

phrases.tran_cn: 沉睡的巨人（潜力还未充分发挥的大公司或组织）

trans.tran_en: extremely big, and much bigger than other things of the same type
an extremely tall strong man, who is often bad and cruel, in children’s stories
